name: 1edge
author: 1edge Team
description: Advanced order manager for 1inch limit order protocol with automated trading strategies

scripts.postinstall: git submodule update --init --recursive && bun run build:sdk
scripts.build:sdk: cd sdk-source && npm install && npm run build
scripts.kill:all: bun run kill:back && bun run kill:front
scripts.dev:services: bun run start:collector & bun run start:api & bun run start:websocket & bun run start:status-checker & wait
scripts.start:front: bun run kill:front && cd front && bun run dev
scripts.dev: bun run start:back & bun run start:front
scripts.typecheck:all: bun run typecheck && bun run typecheck:back && bun run typecheck:front && bun run typecheck:contracts
scripts.build:back: echo 'Backend uses runtime compilation with bun'
scripts.build:front: bun run build:frontend-config && cd front && bun run build
scripts.build:all: bun run build:contracts && bun run build:front && bun run build:back
scripts.test:all: bun run test:contracts && bun run test:front && bun run test:back
scripts.clean:back: echo 'No build artifacts to clean for backend'
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:front && bun run clean:contracts && bun run clean:back
scripts.pre-commit: bun run format && bun run lint && bun run typecheck:all && bun run build:all
scripts.install:all: bun install && cd front && bun install && cd ../contracts && bun install && cd ..
